title: Curses, Inc. and Other Stories
description: A spell that gets you land, money, long golden hair, or a date to the prom canâ€™t be a curse, can it? A curse just gets you dead. Or does it?. . . In these ten stunning short stories, boys and girls learn firsthand just what magic spells, enchantments, and curses really can do.
